recommended_degree: Teknik Industri, Manajemen, Sistem Informasi (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_title: Intern -  Healthcare and Education GTM and Business Management
job_description:
1. Membantu dalam pengolahan data performance dan menganalisa performance di Segment Healthcare, Education and Hospitality & Food Service.
2. Membantu analisa produk yang dijual oleh AM di Segment Healthcare, Education and Hospitality & Food Service.
3. Membantu mengolah data pipeline agar terlihat movement staging activity sales yang dilakukan
4. Membantu dalam kegiatan operasional di GTM Healthcare & Education Account Management yang related dengan administrasi.
5. Membantu review contractual pelanggan di segment Healthcare, Education, and Hospitality and Food Service.
position_type: Intern -  Healthcare and Education GTM and Business Management
